In order to search for the optimum conditions for given silicene grain growth on a Ag substrate, we calculated the FE (
F = −
k B
T ln Z
) by DIA with the potential
U ′
determined by DFT, which were performed by the Vienna ab initio Simulation Package based on local density approximation. The kinetic-energy cutoff for the plane-wave basis set was 400 eV, and the Brillouin zone was sampled with (
2 × 2 × 1
) k-points.
